channel.title: Field asymmetric ion mobility spectrometry on AJTRE
channel.description: Recent content in Field asymmetric ion mobility spectrometry on AJTRE

item.title: Identification of volatile organic compounds by use of Field Asymmetric Ion Mobility Spectrometry
item.description: Field Asymmetric Ion Mobility Spectrometer (FAIMS) provides rapid (30 seconds for a sample) analysis under atmospheric pressure. * corresponding author (chantipmanee.n@hotmail.com) Received: 28 February 2020, Accepted: 06 June 2020, Published: 31 December 2020 DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.4383331 | üìÅ view PDF file Background Field Asymmetric Ion Mobility Spectrometry (FAIMS) is one of the Ion Mobility Spectrometry (IMS) techniques. FAIMS is a very sensitive technique that can identify gaseous phase ions under atmospheric pressure.
